data.name: Aces and Adventures Demo
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Italian, Turkish, Korean, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher (64 bit)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 5.0
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
